TopicTitle: How to advance paused training scenarios

Articles.Content:
Sometimes when doing a training scenario there is no "Next" button appearing even though I have done what the instructions asked. Is there some way of prompting it to do this?

https://imgur.com/6MqRHCg

 

(and why won't imgur images post correctly?!)

8 hours ago, KrisKelvin said:

Sometimes when doing a training scenario there is no "Next" button appearing even though I have done what the instructions asked. Is there some way of prompting it to do this?

https://imgur.com/6MqRHCg

Your navball is minimized, so I can't see how much time is left until your maneuver node. Is it less than 1 minute? Did you click on your orbit and then click on the "Warp to Maneuver Node" button?

 

8 hours ago, KrisKelvin said:

(and why won't imgur images post correctly?!)

 

Imgur has two URL links to each image. The first is like what you did. It is good enough for anyone to find your image. But there is a fancier link that you can find. Go to your image from your link, right click it, and say "Open in 2nd tab" (or however you would do it in your browser). Look at the URL. It now says 'i.imgur.com/6MqRHCg.png'

If you want to post your images so they pop up by themselves (hotlinking), then that second URL is the one you need.
At that point in the training you just need to execute the planned burn to bring up the next window. You may want to adjust your node a little to get the periapsis at the Mun above the surface.
ok, thanks. I shall try that
